Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Посмотрим...”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Let’s see...”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Прежде чем ты отправишься на{Line} экзамен, я должна была тебе ещё{Line} что-то рассказать...”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“I thought there was something else{Line} I needed to go over with you before{Line} you take the SeeD exam...”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“А! Ну конечно! Самое главное!{Line} Не пускай на самотёк развитие{Line} своих стражей. Присматривай за ними!”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Oh yes! Taking care of your GF. This is{Line} something you have to watch out for.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“{Char Squall}, ты кое что забыл...{Line} Своих стражей.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“{Char Squall}, you’re forgetting{Line} something... Your GF.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Прежде чем мы уйдём,{Line} я должна тебе кое-что напомнить.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“I have a few things to explain{Line} before we head off.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Как ты знаешь, стражи дают нам силу.{Line} Чем сильнее страж, тем сильнее ты.”{Next}“Но для того чтобы использовать{Line} потенциал стража, с ним нужно{Line} установить связь. Я напомню,{Line} как это делается...”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“GF gives us strength. The stronger{Line} the GF, the stronger we become.”{Next}“...So, here’s a brief explanation{Line} on junctioning a GF.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Вопросов нет?{Line} Если ты что-то забудешь, то всегда{Line} можешь обратиться к {Color Blue}〖Руководству〗{Color White} в {Color Blue}〖Меню〗{Color White}.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Everything ok up till now?{Line} You can always check back by{Line} accessing {Color Blue}〖Tutorial〗{Color White} from the {Color Blue}〖Menu〗{Color White}.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Постарайся по пути к {Color Blue}〖Огненной пещере〗{Color White},{Line} запасти немного магии из монстров,{Line} при помощи команды ‘Извлечь’.”{Next}“Когда прибудем на место,{Line} я расскажу о том, как приязывать магию...{Line} И не делай такое лицо!{Line} Я обязана тебя проинструктировать!”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Once we get to the {Color Blue}〖Fire Cavern〗{Color White},{Line} I’ll explain how to junction magic.”{Next}“Use the command ‘Draw’ during battle{Line} and stock magic from your enemies.{Line} Be sure to have some stocked!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Готов?”{Next}“{Color Blue}〖Огненная пещера〗{Color White} расположена{Line} на {Color Blue}〖востоке〗{Color White} отсюда.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Ready to go?”{Next}“The {Color Blue}〖Fire Cavern〗{Color White} used for the test{Line} is located {Color Blue}〖east of here〗{Color White}.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Хм? Ты что-то забыл?”{Next}“Хорошо, я подожду здесь.{Line} Постарайся не задерживаться.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Hm? You forgot something?”{Next}“Ok, I’ll be waiting{Line} right here for you.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Очень хорошо.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Well done.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Одевай форму и подходи{Line} в {Color Blue}〖холл первого этажа〗{Color White}.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Now change into your uniform{Line} and assemble at the {Color Blue}〖1F Lobby〗{Color White}.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Встречаемся {Color Blue}〖в холле первого этажа〗{Color White}.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Meet in the {Color Blue}〖1F Lobby〗{Color White} after you change.”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“Huuuwahaah!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Huuuwahaah!”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“Finally made it back...”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Finally made it back...”

Monologue.Current: Selphie{Line}“Seriously...”
Monologue.Original: Selphie{Line}“Seriously...”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“Well, I guess we just wait{Line} for the test results.”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Well, I guess we just wait{Line} for the test results.”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“’Til then.{Line} See ya, {Char Squall}.”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“’Til then.{Line} See ya, {Char Squall}.”

Monologue.Current: Selphie{Line}“See ya!”
Monologue.Original: Selphie{Line}“See ya!”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“Alright! The Garden’s safe!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Alright! The Garden’s safe!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Hey, looks like everything’s alright!”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Hey, looks like everything’s alright!”

Monologue.Current: Quistis{Line}“Oh, thank goodness.{Line} Everything looks alright.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Oh, thank goodness.{Line} Everything looks alright.”

Monologue.Current: Irvine{Line}“Hmm. Doesn’t look like it’s been attacked.”
Monologue.Original: Irvine{Line}“Hmm. Doesn’t look like it’s been attacked.”

Monologue.Current: (It looks like they did it.)
Monologue.Original: (It looks like they did it.)

Monologue.Current: (Still, the missiles could be on their way.)
Monologue.Original: (Still, the missiles could be on their way.)

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“We have to report to the headmaster.{Line} Come on.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“We have to report to the headmaster.{Line} Come on.”
